com.baidu.voicerecognition.android

类 ThreadRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • AudioRecord
      • com.baidu.voicerecognition.android.ThreadRecorder
  • 直接已知子类:
    BufferThreadRecorder

    public class ThreadRecorder
extends AudioRecord
    能够通过音量回调更新音量的录音类
    从以下版本开始:
    2012-9-17
    作者:
    zhanghongchi
